--- editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- # AIP Plan {#care-aip} The __Advance Investment Payment Spend Plan__ data provides payment use, spending category, projected and actual spending of advanced investments payments by __Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs)__. ### Metadata ::: {.cell}
